#summary Make sure that an access token is properly associated with a user and a partner key

==Description==
  * *Authorization Level:* require_partner


==Parameters==
<table cellpadding="2" style="background-color:#E0FFFF; border:1px solid #48D1CC; margin: 0px; width: 100%">
||*Required*||*Name*||*Type*||*Description*||
||*required*||jabberId||string||Jabber ID of the user who is being validated||
|| ||accessSecret||string||Access token which is being validated||
</table>
